source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_00<tab>At the Glittering Basin, Gyorin eagerly awaits the next opportunity for you to aid him in his ascension to mercantile greatness.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_00<tab>無二江流域のギョリンは、冒険者が協力してくれるのを楽しみに待っているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_01<tab>Gyorin has set out to prospect choice mining spots. Travel to the Glittering Basin and speak with him.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_01<tab>ギョリンと話した。一足先に掘る場所を探しに向かったギョリンを追いかけ、無二江流域にいる「ギョリン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_02<tab>Gyorin boasts to you of the Namazu heightened sense of detection gained by way of the glorious barbels about their head and face. He claims to be using this gift to find precious ores for mining. Travel to the Glittering Basin and speak with Gyorin once more.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_02<tab>ギョリンと話した。ナマズオに伝わる、ナマズオ流ヒゲ探知術で、いい鉱物がある場所を探していたのだという。ギョリンを追いかけ、無二江流域にいる「ギョリン」と再度話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_03<tab>Gyorin informs you he has found a choice mining location, but that he is unable to reach it due to a host of monsters in the way. Clear his path of two ruffled hornbills at the Glittering Basin.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_03<tab>ギョリンと話した。よさそうな場所を見つけたものの、近くに魔物がいるのだという。無二江流域で「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2170F01 /var>」を2体討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_04<tab>You have slain all the ruffled hornbills that obstructed Gyorin. Speak with him once more at the Glittering Basin.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2170F01 /var>を討伐した。無二江流域にいる「ギョリン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_05<tab>Gyorin asks that you head back to his manor while he mines the ores he has found. Travel to the destination and await his return.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_05<tab>ギョリンと話した。鉱物を集めるので、先に屋敷に戻っていてほしいと語るギョリン。無二江流域の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA6E101 /var>」で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_06<tab>Gyorin has returned home and shown his fresh haul to an expert in mineral appraisals named Gyofu. According to Gyofu's trained eye, none of the ores Gyorin brought back from the Glittering Basin are of any value. Gyorin leaves in low spirits. Travel to the Glittering Basin and speak with him.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_06<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA6E101 /var>で待機した。ギョリンが戻ってきたのち、鉱物に詳しいギョフにギョリンが集めたものを見てもらったところ、価値がないものばかり集めてきてしまったようだ。ギョリンは、聞いた結果に肩を落としてその場を去っていった。無二江流域の「ギョリン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_07<tab>Gyorin reaches the conclusion that perhaps his barbels are not made for detecting valuable minerals. He tells you he will once again seek another way to make his name as a merchant.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_SEQ_07<tab>ギョリンと話した。自分のヒゲはコウブツ探しには向いていないのかもしれないので、ほかの稼ぎ方がないか調べてみると語るギョリンであった。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_TODO_04<tab>Await Gyorin at the designated location.
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_000<tab>I am ready to begin my life as a miner, a prospector. Yes, yes. I mean to search for my fortune, my fame. I am sure it lies to the west of our manor.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_000付き合ってくれて、どうもありがとねん♪
さっそくコウブツを探しに行こうと思うんだけど、
お屋敷の西の方で、掘る場所を探そうと思ってるんだよねん。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_001<tab>I will go ahead of you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. But please, do come and find me. Yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_001先に行って探しはじめてるから、
)) (( )) 02 /var>も、あとから来てね～ん！

TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_010どこかな、どこかな～ん♪
コウブツはどっこかなぁ～ん♪

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_011<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You gave me a start, a fright. But I am glad to see you. It was so good of you to come, to visit.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_011……ハッ、いつの間に来てたのん！？
来てたなら言ってよ、びっくりするよん！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_012<tab>I am prospecting for ores as we speak, using my fortune-seeking barbels. Yes, yes. The Namazu barbel is a sensitive thing. Mine will detect where the most precious of ores lie.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_012今はね、ボクらに伝わる、ナマズオ流ヒゲ探知術で、
いいコウブツがある場所を探してたところなんだよん。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_013<tab>I do believe I found something! I feel a tingle, a twinge in my barbels.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_013そして、なんとなんと……
よさそうな場所を見つけちゃったのだよん！
スゴいでしょ、えっへん！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_014<tab>They tell me there is great mineral wealth to the north. I must go, I must away!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_014自慢のヒゲが、北の方角から、
成り上がりの気配をビンビン感じちゃってるのよん！
さっそく行ってみるのだよん！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_020<tab>It is all well and good to have found a choice mining location, but I am afraid my hand is stayed. There are a host of nasty beasts lingering, prowling. I can't get to the ore for fear of my life! Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you must help me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_020よさそうな場所を見つけたのはいいものの、
近くに、怖そうな魔物がいるみたいだよん……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>に、あいつを退治してほしいのねん！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_021<tab>It is all well and good to have found a choice mining location, but I am afraid my hand is stayed. There are a host of nasty beasts lingering, prowling. I can't get to the ore for fear of my life! Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you must help me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_021よさそうな場所を見つけたのはいいものの、
近くに、怖そうな魔物がいるみたいだよん……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>に、あいつを退治してほしいのねん！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_030<tab>I knew those monstrosities would pose no match for you. Yes, yes, no match at all. The way is now clear. Leave the rest to me!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_030)) (( )) 02 /var>は強いんだねぇ、びっくりだよん！
ここからあとは、ボクに任せてちょうだいねん！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_031<tab>I will mine these lands and amass a haul of ore the likes of which Yanxia has never seen! But it will require some time, some patience. Yes, yes. You should return to my warehouse and await me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I wish not to bore you with my digging, my picking.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_031このあたりを掘って、コウブツをたくさん集めて持っていくから、
)) (( )) 02 /var>は倉のそばで待っててねん！
楽しみにしててねんっ♪

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_032<tab>I will mine these lands and amass a haul of ore the likes of which Yanxia has never seen! But it will require some time, some patience. Yes, yes. You should return to my warehouse and await me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I wish not to bore you with my digging, my picking.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_032このあたりを掘って、コウブツをたくさん集めて持っていくから、
)) (( )) 02 /var>は倉のそばで待っててねん！
楽しみにしててねんっ♪

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_040<tab>The deed is done, finished. Yes, yes. And what a haul we have! Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and behold the fruits of my labor.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_040んっふふっのふーん♪
)) (( )) 02 /var>にも、
ボクの見事な掘りっぷりを見せてあげたかったのねん♪

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_041<tab>Look at how they sparkle, how they shine. I have no doubt these ores will see me to greatness, to fame.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_041これで、成り上がれること、
間違いなしな気がするのね～ん、んふっ♪

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_042<tab>I must show them to Gyofu. Yes, yes. He is very knowledgeable about the selling of ores. His appraisal will be most reassuring.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_042コウブツは、商売に精通してる、
ギョフさんに見てもらうのがいいから、
さっそく行ってみるとするのねん♪

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_043<tab>Gyofuuu! I have something for you to inspect, to see.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_043ギョフさ～ん！
実は、見てほしいものがあるのねん♪

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYOFU_000_044<tab>You certainly are in good spirits. What is it, Gyorin?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYOFU_000_044どうしたよギョリン？
おみゃあさん、ずいぶんご機嫌だっぺな？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_045<tab>I have been mining, and brought my first haul of findings for your appraisal, your valuation. Tell me, how much gil will these ores fetch at market?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_045んふ……実はね、コウブツを採ってきたのねん！
それでギョフさんに、いくらぐらいで売れそうか、
見てほしいと思っているのねん♪

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYOFU_000_047<tab>Is that where you've been off to all this time? Well then, let us have a look, shall we? Yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYOFU_000_047ほぉ、おみゃあさんが鉱物を採ってきたっぺか。
ほいじゃあ、見てみるっぺよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYOFU_000_048<tab>You want the truth of me, yes Gyorin?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYOFU_000_048<tab>……正直に言っていいっぺか、ギョリン？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_049<tab>And nothing besides. Yes, yes, tell me your honest opinion.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_049うん、もちろんだよん！
楽しみだなぁ、んふふっ♪

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYOFU_000_050<tab>It is difficult to place a value on these ores you have. Quite difficult indeed. And that is because they are so very, very...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYOFU_000_050おみゃあさんが取ってきた鉱物は、
価格を付け難いぐらいに……

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYOFU_000_051<tab>Worthless! You dragged a veritable pile of garbage across Yanxia and into our manor!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYOFU_000_051<tab>ゴミクズ同然の無価値な石コロっぺよ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_052<tab>W-Worthless? But my barbels tingled, twinged... I would have staked my life that these ores were valuable.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_052そ、そんなぁ……。
がんばって探したのに、ガックシだなぁん。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_053<tab>But thank the gods I did not. I suppose I must find another way, another means, to make my fortune. Thank you, Gyofu. I do appreciate your honesty, your candor. Yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_053また、ほかの稼ぎ方がないか、調べてみるとするよん。
ギョフさん、見てくれてありがとねん……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYOFU_000_054<tab>Gyorin seemed to be quite down. I hate to be the one to tell him, but someone had to. Those rocks he had were worthless.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYOFU_000_054ギョリンのやつ、しょんぼりしてたっぺな。
でも、価値が無いのは事実だから、しょうがないっぺよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_060<tab>I used my barbels to detect the ores just like my master taught me. Yes, yes, I did. <sigh> I suppose the barbels of my line are not fit for mining.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_060師匠から教えてもらった探知術どおりにやったのに……。
もしかしてボクのヒゲは、
いいコウブツを見つけるのには向いてないのかねん。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_061<tab>Still, my dream is my dream. I will not give up yet. I will find another path to greatness. And when I do, you will be the first to know, to hear, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ426_02749_GYORIN_000_061ちょっと、ほかの稼ぎ方を探してみるとするよん。
何か、いい方法が見つかったら教えるから、
また)) (( )) 02 /var>にも付き合ってほしいのねん……。
